title: Limen Group Const
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: limen_group_const
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $141.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Limen Group Const. The average
  contract duration was 2.1 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.8M. The longest
  contract was 3.81 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.2M.
lookup_name: 'LIMEN GROUP CONST'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '141.7K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '40%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '32%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '4.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.1'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.8M'
s425_max_duration: '3.81'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.2M'
---
